nodes.title: Gradle build file for Maven Central/SonaType deployment
Simple Gradle build file to deploy to SonaType or local Maven repo
Add extension NV_internalformat_sample_query and demo for reconstructing position from depth
Added comments to OpenAl, OpenCL and OpenGL exceptions
Added an exclusion for reference counting on "NVIDIA CUDA" platform.
Fix for running $ ant tests on Mac OSX
Added fix for javax.script.ScriptException seen on Mac OS X
Check for non-ASCII characters inside workaround check for JDK-8195129
fix APIUtil.apiGetManifestValue() for GraalVM native image build
fix(bullet): remove misplaced greek characters in JavaDoc
Don't publish dependency scopes in BOM
fix(core): handle trailing newlines in api version parsing.
Bring in patch from remotery upstream that supports OpenBSD
for Callback.Container classes, when it free(), I think it is better  to free its delegate first.
add compatibility for OpenGL ES contexts in GL.createCapabilities()
build: add support for Linux MIPS64 cross compilation
Fix memLengthUTF8 result being incorrect for unpaired low surrogates
build: Update URL for maven repo
feat(demo): make use of JOML 1.9.18+ and refactor
Specifying GLFW 3.2 for MacOS X compatibility
Convert publish Gradle script to Kotlin DSL and the maven-publish plugin
Update par_shapes and added par_streamlines bindings
add code to build on OpenBSD
Use TLS + canonical URL for Maven Central repository
Relative property location is invalid when building in top-level dirs on linux
config(netbeans): Port to new directory layout
build: update JOML to latest version
Make Listener3i take ALint instead of ALfloat
docs: move libdive license out of the source directory
fix(glfw): fix incorrect value for GLFW_HOVERED
fix(GL/GLES): throw an exception for calls without OpenGL context
Separate template sources from main artifact sources
build: add missing dependencies for demo task
Integrate the const modifier into the type system
updated the class path for Eclipse
build: make native modules optional at runtime
Fix contribution guide and contributors link in the README
build: make gradlew executable on unix
Conditionally skip StackTest.testOOME() at runtime. Closes #275
Add missing dependency check for org.lwjgl.demo.openal.HRTFDemo
Use ASM to generate classes at runtime; map jclass to Class; add JNI …
Add bindings to Assimp, the Open Asset Import Library
Fix docs on MemoryUtil for method memASCII method
Update license URL across all files & tweak license
Prevent NPE if Manifest#getAttributes returns null
